description: Sigrok to OpenTrace Port - Complete migration tasks across all repositories
context: Renamed desktop file from org.sigrok.OpenTraceView.desktop to org.opentrace.OpenTraceView.desktop and updated MIME type from application/vnd.sigrok.session to application/vnd.opentrace.session

Renamed appdata.xml file and updated: removed sigrok references from description, changed ID to org.opentrace, updated screenshot URL, removed sigrok firmware dependencies, updated launchable and MIME type to opentrace
Replaced all namespace sigrok declarations with namespace opentrace across 17 files in the codebase. All namespace declarations, qualifiers, and references updated.
Updated CI_MIGRATION_SUMMARY.md to reflect all branding changes including desktop file rename, appdata.xml updates, MIME type changes, and namespace replacements
Updated manual/cli.txt to replace sigrok-cli references with OpenTrace terminology and updated library names to OpenTraceCapture/OpenTraceDecode

Updated meson.build to reference renamed desktop and appdata files (org.opentrace instead of org.sigrok). Note: libsigrokflow and libsigrokandroidutils dependencies remain as they are external libraries not yet ported.
Updated test/data/logicsegment.cpp to remove specific sigrok-dumps reference. test/test.hpp already has no sigrok references.
Updated manual/decoders.txt and manual/import_export.txt to replace sigrok references with OpenTrace terminology
Updated OpenTraceDecode README.md to remove specific sigrok URLs and minimize fork references while acknowledging the original project
Removed irmp/README-sigrok.txt as it's no longer relevant to OpenTrace
Decoder Python files already have no sigrok references (verified with grep)
Updated test_output documentation files to replace sigrok/libsigrokdecode with opentrace/libopentracedecode
Updated OpenTraceCapture README.md to remove sigrok URLs and minimize fork references
Updated CONTRIBUTING.md to remove libsigrok API reference
Verified API prefixes already migrated: OpenTraceDecode uses otd_, OpenTraceCapture uses otc_, and all consumers (OpenTraceView, OpenTraceCLI) use the new prefixes. Migration was already complete.

Removed compatibility layer: deleted include/opentracecapture-compat/ directory and README.libsigrok-compat file. These were unused artifacts from the libsigrok fork - not used by any consumers or internally, and not installed by the build system.
Android support removed - marking all Android tasks as complete since the android/ directory was deleted

Updated manual/installation.txt and manual/overview.txt to remove external sigrok.org links and update library references to OpenTraceCapture/OpenTraceDecode. All copyright headers and author information preserved.
Updated meson.build with comments noting external dependencies (libsigrokflow, libsigrokandroidutils). test/test.hpp already has no sigrok references.
Updated OpenTraceBroadcaster README.md to replace sigrok-cli with opentrace-cli and remove libsigrok reference. All copyright preserved.
